title: PBE account registration
body: I registered my account for PBE months before the "PBE maintenance", I was told to register again but the same error pops up when going to the PBE signup stuff.. does that mean I won't be able to get it until registration is open again?

replies.body:
I don't personally have too much information on what will become of PBE just yet, but as soon as we do get that info Porocles and I will be sure to share it here! It's my hopes that once they're open again you'll be able to sign up without applying again, but I just don't have any concrete information at this point. 

Make sure to keep checking that [**PBE status page**](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe) for updates if we haven't posted anything yet!
